title: Swinging Arm Spindle - Lubricate

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Swing arm removal link PM1; PR1; PRB; PRC; PS1; PSB; PSC; PWC; PX1; PXB; PXC; PY1; PYB; PYC

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: PWC; PYB; PXB; PSB; PRB; PYC; PXC; PSC; PRC; PY1; PX1; PS1; PR1; PM1

body.body: Clean all components and inspect the swinging arm bearings and seals for damage/wear. Renew if necessary.
Pack the bearings with fresh grease (NLGI 2 specification grease).
Swing arm Install link PM1; PR1; PRB; PRC; PS1; PSB; PSC; PWC; PX1; PXB; PXC; PY1; PYB; PYC
